definition: bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Bad water kills more children than war.
sentences.chinese: 壞水殺死的孩子比戰爭更多。

sentences.english: With just enough of talent, and no more.
sentences.chinese: 剛夠使的壞水，再要多也沒有。
